title: Ownership and personal use of tablet computers 2012 , by country
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of population for 8 number of Countrys.
The maximum Percentage of population 24.0 is found at Country Spain and the minimum is found at Germany where Country is 10.0.
The difference of Percentage of population between the highest and lowest Country is 14.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Percentage of population in the y axis.
The maximum Percentage of population 24.0 is found at Country Spain and the minimum is found at Germany where Country is 10.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of population for 8 number of Countrys.
The maximum Percentage of population 24.0 is found at Country Spain and the minimum is found at Germany where Country is 10.0.
The difference of Percentage of population between the highest and lowest Country is 14.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of population for 8 number of Countrys.
Country Spain has the highest Percentage of population and Germany has the lowest Percentage of population.
The difference of Percentage of population between the highest and lowest Country is 14.0.
Country Spain is higher than any other Countrys with value 24.0, followed by Australia, and Italy. Down to Country Germany with the lowest value 10.0.
Country Spain, and Australia share the same value 24.0.
The highest value 24.0 at Spain is almost 1.31 times larger than the average value 18.38.
The Percentage of population is 147.0 if we add up values of all Countrys.
